short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that provides an alternative way of viewing images on workast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that allows you to preview an image in the same active tab.

This extension is still a work in progress, but should work dynamically with all urls containing workast.io.
